verses.verse: אֵ֜לֶּה <S%H428><s%> 'El-leh These מַסְעֵ֣י <S%H4550><s%> mas-'Ei These [are] the journeys בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> ve-nei- of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which יָצְא֛וּ <S%H3318><s%> ya-tze-'U which went forth מֵאֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> me-'E-retz out of the land מִצְרַ֖יִם <S%H4714><s%> mitz-Ra-yim of Egypt לְצִבְאֹתָ֑ם <S%H6635><s%> le-tziv-'o-Tam; with their armies בְּיַד־ <S%H3027><s%> be-yad- under the hand מֹשֶׁ֖ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh of Moses וְאַהֲרֹֽן׃ <S%H175><s%> ve-'a-ha-Ron. and Aaron

וַיִּכְתֹּ֨ב <S%H3789><s%> vai-yich-To wrote מֹשֶׁ֜ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh And Moses אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- מוֹצָאֵיהֶ֛ם <S%H4161><s%> mo-tza-'ei-Hem their goings out לְמַסְעֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H4550><s%> le-mas-'ei-Hem according to their journeys עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- by פִּ֣י <S%H6310><s%> pi by the commandment יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; of the LORD וְאֵ֥לֶּה <S%H428><s%> ve-'El-leh and these מַסְעֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H4550><s%> mas-'ei-Hem and these [are] their journeys לְמוֹצָאֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H4161><s%> le-mo-tza-'ei-Hem. according to their goings out

וַיִּסְע֤וּ <S%H5265><s%> vai-yis-'U And they departed מֵֽרַעְמְסֵס֙ <S%H7486><s%> me-ra'-me-Ses from Rameses בַּחֹ֣דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> ba-Cho-desh month הָרִאשׁ֔וֹן <S%H7223><s%> ha-ri-Shon, in the first בַּחֲמִשָּׁ֥ה <S%H2568><s%> ba-cha-mish-Shah fif עָשָׂ֛ר <S%H6240><s%> 'a-Sar teen י֖וֹם <S%H3117><s%> Yom day לַחֹ֣דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> la-Cho-desh month הָרִאשׁ֑וֹן <S%H7223><s%> ha-ri-Shon; of the first מִֽמָּחֳרַ֣ת <S%H4283><s%> mi-mo-cho-Rat on the morrow הַפֶּ֗סַח <S%H6453><s%> hap-Pe-sach, after the passover יָצְא֤וּ <S%H3318><s%> ya-tze-'U went out בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> ve-nei- the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel בְּיָ֣ד <S%H3027><s%> be-Yad hand רָמָ֔ה <S%H7311><s%> ra-Mah, with an high לְעֵינֵ֖י <S%H5869><s%> le-'ei-Nei in the sight כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- of all מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <S%H4713><s%> mitz-Ra-yim. Egyptian

וּמִצְרַ֣יִם <S%H4713><s%> u-mitz-Ra-yim Egyptian מְקַבְּרִ֗ים <S%H6912><s%> me-kab-be-Rim, buried אֵת֩ <S%H853><s%> 'et אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher whom הִכָּ֧ה <S%H5221><s%> hik-Kah had smitten יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh which the LORD בָּהֶ֖ם ba-Hem כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all בְּכ֑וֹר <S%H1060><s%> be-Chor; all [their] firstborn וּבֵאלֹ֣הֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H430><s%> u-ve-Lo-hei-Hem, among them upon their gods עָשָׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Sah executed יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh also the LORD שְׁפָטִֽים׃ <S%H8201><s%> she-fa-Tim. judgments

וַיִּסְע֥וּ <S%H5265><s%> vai-yis-'U removed בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> ve-nei- And the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel מֵרַעְמְסֵ֑ס <S%H7486><s%> me-ra'-me-Ses; from Rameses וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <S%H2583><s%> vai-ya-cha-Nu and pitched בְּסֻכֹּֽת׃ <S%H5523><s%> be-suk-Kot. in Succoth

וַיִּסְע֖וּ <S%H5265><s%> vai-yis-'U And they departed מִסֻּכֹּ֑ת <S%H5523><s%> mis-suk-Kot; from Succoth וַיַּחֲנ֣וּ <S%H2583><s%> vai-ya-cha-Nu and pitched בְאֵתָ֔ם <S%H864><s%> ve-'e-Tam, in Etham אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which בִּקְצֵ֥ה <S%H7097><s%> bik-Tzeh which [is] in the edge הַמִּדְבָּֽר׃ <S%H4057><s%> ham-mid-Bar. of the wilderness

וַיִּסְעוּ֙ <S%H5265><s%> vai-yis-'U And they removed מֵֽאֵתָ֔ם <S%H864><s%> me-'e-Tam, from Etham וַיָּ֙שָׁב֙ <S%H7725><s%> vai-Ya-shov and turned again עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- and פִּ֣י pi הַחִירֹ֔ת <S%H6367><s%> ha-chi-Rot, unto Pihahiroth אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- and פְּנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> pe-Nei before בַּ֣עַל Ba-'al צְפ֑וֹן <S%H1189><s%> tze-Fon; which [is] before Baalzephon וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <S%H2583><s%> vai-ya-cha-Nu and they pitched לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> lif-Nei before מִגְדֹּֽל׃ <S%H4024><s%> mig-Dol. Migdol

וַיִּסְעוּ֙ <S%H5265><s%> vai-yis-'U And they departed מִפְּנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> mip-pe-Nei from before הַֽחִירֹ֔ת <S%H6367><s%> ha-chi-Rot, Pihahiroth וַיַּֽעַבְר֥וּ <S%H5674><s%> vai-ya-'av-Ru and passed through בְתוֹךְ־ <S%H8432><s%> ve-toch- the midst הַיָּ֖ם <S%H3220><s%> hai-Yam of the sea הַמִּדְבָּ֑רָה <S%H4057><s%> ham-mid-Ba-rah; into the wilderness וַיֵּ֨לְכ֜וּ <S%H1980><s%> vai-Ye-le-Chu went דֶּ֣רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> De-rech journey שְׁלֹ֤שֶׁת <S%H7969><s%> she-Lo-shet three יָמִים֙ <S%H3117><s%> ya-Mim days' בְּמִדְבַּ֣ר <S%H4057><s%> be-mid-Bar in the wilderness אֵתָ֔ם <S%H864><s%> 'e-Tam, of Etham וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <S%H2583><s%> vai-ya-cha-Nu and pitched בְּמָרָֽה׃ <S%H4785><s%> be-ma-Rah. in Marah

וַיִּסְעוּ֙ <S%H5265><s%> vai-yis-'U And they removed מִמָּרָ֔ה <S%H4785><s%> mi-ma-Rah, from Marah וַיָּבֹ֖אוּ <S%H935><s%> vai-ya-Vo-'u and came אֵילִ֑מָה <S%H362><s%> 'ei-Li-mah; unto Elim וּ֠בְאֵילִם <S%H362><s%> U-ve-'ei-lim and in Elim שְׁתֵּ֣ים <S%H8147><s%> she-Teim both עֶשְׂרֵ֞ה <S%H6240><s%> 'es-Reh ten עֵינֹ֥ת <S%H5869><s%> 'ei-Not fountains מַ֛יִם <S%H4325><s%> Ma-yim of water וְשִׁבְעִ֥ים <S%H7657><s%> ve-shiv-'Im and threescore and ten תְּמָרִ֖ים <S%H8558><s%> te-ma-Rim palm trees וַיַּחֲנוּ־ <S%H2583><s%> vai-ya-cha-nu- and they pitched שָֽׁם׃ <S%H8033><s%> Sham. there

וַיִּסְע֖וּ <S%H5265><s%> vai-yis-'U And they removed מֵאֵילִ֑ם <S%H362><s%> me-'ei-Lim; from Elim וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <S%H2583><s%> vai-ya-cha-Nu and encamped עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- and יַם־ <S%H3220><s%> yam- sea סֽוּף׃ <S%H5488><s%> Suf. by the Red

וַיִּסְע֖וּ <S%H5265><s%> vai-yis-'U And they removed מִיַּם־ <S%H3220><s%> mi-yam- sea ס֑וּף <S%H5488><s%> Suf; from the Red וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <S%H2583><s%> vai-ya-cha-Nu and encamped בְּמִדְבַּר־ <S%H4057><s%> be-mid-bar- in the wilderness סִֽין׃ <S%H5512><s%> Sin. of Sin

וַיִּסְע֖וּ <S%H5265><s%> vai-yis-'U And they took their journey מִמִּדְבַּר־ <S%H4057><s%> mi-mid-bar- out of the wilderness סִ֑ין <S%H5512><s%> Sin; of Sin וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <S%H2583><s%> vai-ya-cha-Nu and encamped בְּדָפְקָֽה׃ <S%H1850><s%> be-da-fe-Kah. in Dophkah

וַיִּסְע֖וּ <S%H5265><s%> vai-yis-'U And they departed מִדָּפְקָ֑ה <S%H1850><s%> mid-da-fe-Kah; from Dophkah וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <S%H2583><s%> vai-ya-cha-Nu and encamped בְּאָלֽוּשׁ׃ <S%H442><s%> be-'a-Lush. in Alush

וַיִּסְע֖וּ <S%H5265><s%> vai-yis-'U And they removed מֵאָל֑וּשׁ <S%H442><s%> me-'a-Lush; from Alush וַֽיַּחֲנוּ֙ <S%H2583><s%> vai-ya-cha-Nu and encamped בִּרְפִידִ֔ם <S%H7508><s%> bir-fi-Dim, at Rephidim וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- no הָ֨יָה <S%H1961><s%> Ha-yah had שָׁ֥ם <S%H8033><s%> sham now it was there מַ֛יִם <S%H4325><s%> Ma-yim where was no water לָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> la-'Am for the people לִשְׁתּֽוֹת׃ <S%H8354><s%> lish-Tot. to drink

וַיִּסְע֖וּ <S%H5265><s%> vai-yis-'U And they departed מֵרְפִידִ֑ם <S%H7508><s%> me-re-fi-Dim; from Rephidim וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <S%H2583><s%> vai-ya-cha-Nu and pitched בְּמִדְבַּ֥ר <S%H4057><s%> be-mid-Bar in the wilderness סִינָֽי׃ <S%H5514><s%> si-Nai. of Sinai

וַיִּסְע֖וּ <S%H5265><s%> vai-yis-'U And they removed מִמִּדְבַּ֣ר <S%H4057><s%> mi-mid-Bar from the desert סִינָ֑י <S%H5514><s%> si-Nai; of Sinai וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <S%H2583><s%> vai-ya-cha-Nu and pitched בְּקִבְרֹ֥ת be-kiv-Rot הַֽתַּאֲוָֽה׃ <S%H6914><s%> Hat-ta-'a-Vah. at Kibrothhattaavah

וַיִּסְע֖וּ <S%H5265><s%> vai-yis-'U And they departed מִקִּבְרֹ֣ת mik-kiv-Rot הַֽתַּאֲוָ֑ה <S%H6914><s%> hat-ta-'a-Vah; from Kibrothhattaavah וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <S%H2583><s%> vai-ya-cha-Nu and encamped בַּחֲצֵרֹֽת׃ <S%H2698><s%> ba-cha-tze-Rot. at Hazeroth

וַיִּסְע֖וּ <S%H5265><s%> vai-yis-'U And they departed מֵחֲצֵרֹ֑ת <S%H2698><s%> me-cha-tze-Rot; from Hazeroth וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <S%H2583><s%> vai-ya-cha-Nu and pitched בְּרִתְמָֽה׃ <S%H7575><s%> be-rit-Mah. in Rithmah

וַיִּסְע֖וּ <S%H5265><s%> vai-yis-'U And they departed מֵרִתְמָ֑ה <S%H7575><s%> me-rit-Mah; from Rithmah וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <S%H2583><s%> vai-ya-cha-Nu and pitched בְּרִמֹּ֥ן be-rim-Mon פָּֽרֶץ׃ <S%H7428><s%> Pa-retz. at Rimmonparez

וַיִּסְע֖וּ <S%H5265><s%> vai-yis-'U And they departed מֵרִמֹּ֣ן me-rim-Mon פָּ֑רֶץ <S%H7428><s%> Pa-retz; from Rimmonparez וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <S%H2583><s%> vai-ya-cha-Nu and pitched בְּלִבְנָֽה׃ <S%H3841><s%> be-liv-Nah. in Libnah

וַיִּסְע֖וּ <S%H5265><s%> vai-yis-'U And they removed מִלִּבְנָ֑ה <S%H3841><s%> mil-liv-Nah; from Libnah וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <S%H2583><s%> vai-ya-cha-Nu and pitched בְּרִסָּֽה׃ <S%H7446><s%> be-ris-Sah. at Rissah

וַיִּסְע֖וּ <S%H5265><s%> vai-yis-'U And they journeyed מֵרִסָּ֑ה <S%H7446><s%> me-ris-Sah; from Rissah וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <S%H2583><s%> vai-ya-cha-Nu and pitched בִּקְהֵלָֽתָה׃ <S%H6954><s%> bik-he-La-tah. in Kehelathah

וַיִּסְע֖וּ <S%H5265><s%> vai-yis-'U And they went מִקְּהֵלָ֑תָה <S%H6954><s%> mik-ke-he-La-tah; from Kehelathah וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <S%H2583><s%> vai-ya-cha-Nu and pitched בְּהַר־ <S%H2022><s%> be-har- in mount שָֽׁפֶר׃ <S%H8234><s%> Sha-fer. Shapher

וַיִּסְע֖וּ <S%H5265><s%> vai-yis-'U And they removed מֵֽהַר־ <S%H2022><s%> me-har- from mount שָׁ֑פֶר <S%H8234><s%> Sha-fer; Shapher וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <S%H2583><s%> vai-ya-cha-Nu and encamped בַּחֲרָדָֽה׃ <S%H2732><s%> ba-cha-ra-Dah. in Haradah

וַיִּסְע֖וּ <S%H5265><s%> vai-yis-'U And they removed מֵחֲרָדָ֑ה <S%H2732><s%> me-cha-ra-Dah; from Haradah וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <S%H2583><s%> vai-ya-cha-Nu and pitched בְּמַקְהֵלֹֽת׃ <S%H4722><s%> be-mak-he-Lot. in Makheloth

וַיִּסְע֖וּ <S%H5265><s%> vai-yis-'U And they removed מִמַּקְהֵלֹ֑ת <S%H4722><s%> mi-mak-he-Lot; from Makheloth וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <S%H2583><s%> vai-ya-cha-Nu and encamped בְּתָֽחַת׃ <S%H8480><s%> be-Ta-chat. at Tahath

וַיִּסְע֖וּ <S%H5265><s%> vai-yis-'U And they departed מִתָּ֑חַת <S%H8480><s%> mit-Ta-chat; from Tahath וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <S%H2583><s%> vai-ya-cha-Nu and pitched בְּתָֽרַח׃ <S%H8646><s%> be-Ta-rach. at Tarah

וַיִּסְע֖וּ <S%H5265><s%> vai-yis-'U And they removed מִתָּ֑רַח <S%H8646><s%> mit-Ta-rach; from Tarah וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <S%H2583><s%> vai-ya-cha-Nu and pitched בְּמִתְקָֽה׃ <S%H4989><s%> be-mit-Kah. in Mithcah

וַיִּסְע֖וּ <S%H5265><s%> vai-yis-'U And they went מִמִּתְקָ֑ה <S%H4989><s%> mi-mit-Kah; from Mithcah וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <S%H2583><s%> vai-ya-cha-Nu and pitched בְּחַשְׁמֹנָֽה׃ <S%H2832><s%> be-chash-mo-Nah. in Hashmonah

וַיִּסְע֖וּ <S%H5265><s%> vai-yis-'U And they departed מֵֽחַשְׁמֹנָ֑ה <S%H2832><s%> me-chash-mo-Nah; from Hashmonah וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <S%H2583><s%> vai-ya-cha-Nu and encamped בְּמֹסֵרֽוֹת׃ <S%H4149><s%> be-mo-se-Rot. at Moseroth

וַיִּסְע֖וּ <S%H5265><s%> vai-yis-'U And they departed מִמֹּסֵר֑וֹת <S%H4149><s%> mi-mo-se-Rot; from Moseroth וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <S%H2583><s%> vai-ya-cha-Nu and pitched בִּבְנֵ֥י biv-Nei יַעֲקָֽן׃ <S%H1142><s%> ya-'a-Kan. in Benejaakan

וַיִּסְע֖וּ <S%H5265><s%> vai-yis-'U And they removed מִבְּנֵ֣י mib-be-Nei יַעֲקָ֑ן <S%H1142><s%> ya-'a-Kan; from Benejaakan וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <S%H2583><s%> vai-ya-cha-Nu and encamped בְּחֹ֥ר be-Chor הַגִּדְגָּֽד׃ <S%H2735><s%> hag-gid-Gad. at Horhagidgad

וַיִּסְע֖וּ <S%H5265><s%> vai-yis-'U And they went מֵחֹ֣ר me-Chor הַגִּדְגָּ֑ד <S%H2735><s%> hag-gid-Gad; from Horhagidgad וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <S%H2583><s%> vai-ya-cha-Nu and pitched בְּיָטְבָֽתָה׃ <S%H3193><s%> be-ya-te-Va-tah. in Jotbathah
